items.content_html: Logiboutik is an open-source, lightweight stock and invoice management app designed for small businesses with local market partnerships. This front-end repository contains the NextJS app for the project.
items.title: MarioGith/logiboutik-front: Logiboutik is an open-source, lightweight stock and invoice management app designed for small businesses with local market partnerships. This front-end repository contains the NextJS app for the project.

items.content_html: Logiboutik is an open-source, lightweight stock and invoice management app designed for small businesses with local market partnerships. This back-end repository contains the ExpressJS app with MongoDB for the project.
items.title: MarioGith/logiboutik-back: Logiboutik is an open-source, lightweight stock and invoice management app designed for small businesses with local market partnerships. This back-end repository contains the ExpressJS app with MongoDB for the project.

items.content_html: Continu is a powerful tool for managing key-value pairs in an application. Its simple and lightweight design makes it easy to use. Besides, defining default values it is also possible to execute transformations & validations before setting any value.
items.title: tada5hi/continu: Continu is a powerful tool for managing key-value pairs in an application. Its simple and lightweight design makes it easy to use. Besides, defining default values it is also possible to execute transformations & validations before setting any value.
